summary: Just a  small mod to make the housecarl of Riften look a bit nicer.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that alters the hair and face of the Riften housecarl, Iona. I was\\\'t really happy with the way Riften\\\'s housecarl looked, so I decided to play around with her features until, suddenly, Iona looked like someone that the Dovahkiin would actually want to have on adventures.

Update** - This was a trial run for a much more in-depth NPC appearance mod. no spoilers as to the level of changes, or how many will be changed, but bear in mind, these will all be based on my own personal preferences, not based on what people \"want to see\". Some NPCs may even get a gender swap, just for fun. Voices could get swapped as well, also just for fun.



Changes:
Changed to better hair option and changed colour to medium brown
Changed eye shape and colour
Made essential, so she can\\\'t die. (I didn\\\'t want to see my work get eaten by a dragon)



UPDATE LOG

--v1.0
-Final release, I don\\\'t plan on doing any more with this specific mod.




PM me or comment with requests. Bear in mind that I will require permission to edit the work of others. If you want, I can ask,  but there are no guarantees.
author: Gunz77
